src:
Trinkijeri: Loše, sramotno, žao mi je zbog igrača
05 Nov 2019, 22:38 by Darko
Andrea Trinkijeri je posle prvog poraza Partizana u Evrokupu rekao da je njegov tim odigrao loše u svim segmentima i zaslužio da izgubi od Venecije.
– Venecija je bila bolja i pametnija od nas, nadigrali su nas. Ovo je bila jedna od onih utakmica kada pokušavate sve, a ništa vam ne uspeva. Nismo imali dovoljno energije i nismo imali pravu priliku da pobedimo. Bili smo loši u svim segmentima. Koncentracija, pristup, kako koristiti faulove, nismo čitali njihove akcije… Bilo je sramotno, ali ovakva utakmica, koja je bila baš loša, ne sme obrisati sve druge stvari koje smo do sada uradili. Ako smo pametni, shvatićemo poruku, rekao je Trinkijeri.
Trinkijeri je dodao da nije ljut, već razočaran.

– Delovali smo kao da smo se jutros okupili i rekli idemo na basket. Ovo nije prava slika naše ekipe. Nisam toliko ljut, koliko mi je žao jer igrači nisu zaslužili ovakvu utakmicu posle svega što su prošli u poslednjih mesec i po dana. Sigurno neću uzeti pištolj i ući u svlačionicu.

Trener Partizana se još jednom požalio da nema dovoljno vremena za trening.
– Biće još ovakvih utakmica ove sezone, ali biće i mečeva kao što su bili u Veneciji, Limožu, protiv Lokomotive. Nemamo vremena da treniramo i onda moramo za svaku utakmicu nešto da izmislimo. Danas nismo ništa izmislili, zaključio je Trinkijeri.

POVEZANE OBJAVE
text:
Trinkies: Bad, shamefully, sorry about the players
05 Nov 2019, 23:38 by Darko
Andrea Trinkieri said after Partizan's first defeat at Eurocup that his team played poorly in all segments and deserved to lose to Venice.
- Venice was better and smarter than we were, they outplayed us. This was one of those games when you try everything and nothing works. We didn't have enough energy and we didn't have a real chance to win. We were bad in all segments. The concentration, the approach, how to use the fouls, we didn't read their actions ... It was shameful, but this kind of game, which was really bad, must not erase all the other things we have done so far. If we're smart, we'll get the message, Trinkieri said.
Trinkieri added that he was not angry but disappointed.

- We acted as if we had gathered this morning and said let's go to the basket. This is not a real picture of our team. I'm not so angry, how sorry I am because the players didn't deserve a match like this after all they've been through in the last month and a half. I certainly won't take my gun and get into the locker room.

Partizan coach once again complained that he did not have enough time to train.
- There will be more games like this this season, but there will be matches like they were in Venice, Limoges, against Lokomotiv. We don't have time to train and then we have to invent something for every game. We have not invented anything today, Trinkieri concluded.
